header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Shops / small businesses, online commerce, scams, hairdressing, health / illness, work, family, fast food
header.activity: Members of a family business chatting at the back of the shop.
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, advising, telling jokes

that's so much all of my friends have been absolutely flabbergasted at how much the the all their bills have gone up just in the past in the past month

yeah yeah no they're all out for scamming I booked a ticket on er Ryan Air and the there there was this box that came up when I booked the ticket that said do you want a ten pound discount voucher off your next flight? And so I thought they're giving me a free money yes okay alright then if I ever feel that I have to book a ticket with Ryan Air again I'll get ten pounds off okay alright so I pressed yes and then about a year later I realised that erm about thirty pounds had been taken out of my bank account every month no it wasn't thirty pounds it was about I think it was about twenty euros which wouldn't be that much but still over a year it all mounts up and I was thinking who is this Shopping Discount? Cos it came up as erm debited by Shopping Discounts
mm

and I was thinking well I've never used a company called Shopping Discounts and especially not every month so I did an internet search on it and found that it was a company that erm you know like Groupon?
no I haven't heard of them but er
no but they erm they basically they're a a company that offer online discounts
mm

erm so if you as a company want to discount you've got lots of stock that you want to get rid of you contact this company and say put a special offer out to your members that gives them a very reduced price in all their stuff
mm right

erm so their members of of Shoppers Discounts erm pay a certain amount every month in order to get the information about all these discounts and you can get like a a facial for ten pounds or a hair cut for ten pounds
mm

but obviously you know I'd never signed up to this and it transpired that me clicking I want a ten pound money off voucher on the Ryan Air I'd agreed to then passing my details on to a third party to then take money out of my account without my permission every month
you'd agreed for unbelievable isn't it? That's disgraceful
in the end I got it back but they were they were evil about it
mm terrible
they were no we didn't you know I was you know you did this on the basis of deception

it was never made er covert or clear what was going on and it's yeah

yeah confirmation

but nothing came up so I thought well that's a bit strange so I went into it again to find out what this thing was and there was an email address so I emailed it and it was a bit vague y I didn't really know who I was emailing and then I had this email back from Proctor and Gamble so it was obviously a Proctor and Gamble product which prob Olay probably is and it said erm sorry we don't know what sample you're talking about we don't actually have any offers at the moment for any samples
